extension.name: Revol Responsive slider | Globbersthemes
extension.author: Globbers
extension.description:
Mod REVOL slideshow for joomla3x and joomla2.5x

Mod REVOL slideshow Joomla Extension ,design by globbers.
Visit globbersthemes: http://www.globbersthemes.com.
